import React from 'react' class AddEmp extends React.Component{ constructor(){ super(); this.state={ full_name:'', email:'', contact:'', address:'' } } // Input change handler changeHandler(){ console.log('Input has changed') } // submit form submitForm(){ console.log('Data submitted') } render(){ return (
Full Name
Contact

) } } export default AddEmp
